Name: Crafter
Actions: Attack, BuildBlock, BuildObject, BuildZone, CraftItem, Cook, TillSoil, Gather, Wrangle, Plant, Brew
Description: Nothing of real substance gets done without a crafter there to do it. If you need something built, you need a crafter involved. You want some walls built, that's right, a crafter is gonna do it. They are the most versatile dwarves, capable of just about anything except mining.
